root.name: Webcam Snap
root.description:
Displays and processes live webcam image using protocols.
The processing protocol should start and end with an 'Image Passing Block'.
This plugin was created during the 2nd ICY Coding Party, May 2015, with help from Alexandre Dufour, Stephane Dallongeville and Fabrice de Chaumont.
root.author: jmutterer - Jerome Mutterer
root.changelog:
- Version 0.0.1.1 Date 2015-06-03 09:53:49
